clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Palonosetron in Preventing the Gastrointestinal Reactions Induced by 3-day Highly Emetogenic Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of Palonosetron in Preventing the Gastrointestinal Reactions Induced by 3-day Highly Emetogenic Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: This study is to assess the efficacy and safety of palonosetron in preventing the acute and delayed emesis induced by 3-day highly emetogenic chemotherapy. A double-blind, crossover design is used and granisetron is the positive control.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Complete Response(CR) within 24-120 hours after chemotherapy

intervention.description: 3-day chemotherapy regimens including cisplatin, cisplatin: 25mg/m2 d1-3

facility.name: Tongji Hospital,Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology
